basics.name: Not specified
basics.label: Administrative Assistant/Site Clerk
basics.summary: Committed and motivated Administrative Assistant with exceptional customer service and decision making skills. Strong work ethic, professional demeanor and great initiative. Open for changes.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the receptionist area, greeting visitors and responding to requests. Worked on spreadsheets, maintained office organization, answered phones and handled customers' concerns. Assisted in other offices, ordered uniforms, tracked supply inventory, handled Health Inspection Reports and made packets for new hires.
highlights: Improved office organization by developing more efficient filing systems and customer database protocols.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed receptionist area and maintenance of equipment. Handled telephone and in-person requests, managed incoming and outgoing correspondence and maintained spreadsheets, reports and documents.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed reception duties including handling calls, paging, faxing, filing invoices, distributing mail, creating reports, and tracking of company directory. Also dealt with external and internal communications.
